title: 1002: HERE’S HOW BITCOIN CAN REACH $10,000,000 PER BTC, ACCORDING TO TOP CRYPTO RESEARCHER!!
description:
The crypto world is abuzz after a Bitcoin chart predicting an astronomical BTC price made the rounds on social media, suggesting a full 99.7% of Bitcoin’s total wealth gener­a­tion remains ahead, ultimately meaning Bitcoin still has 400x to grow, dwarfing the gold milestone.

By putting Bitcoin’s current valua­tion into perspec­tive, it becomes clear that it’s still very early for Bitcoin. 

"Bitcoin has the potential to become worth over $10 million a coin."
